metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1324 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A specially crafted ZIP archive can be used to cause an infinite loop inside of Apache Commons Compress' extra field parser used by the ZipFile and ZipArchiveInputStream classes in versions 1.11 to 1.15. This can be used to mount a denial of service attack against services that use Compress' zip package.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
